name: Bittersweet
description:
v.3 patch fixes:

  • Metal plate and painting can now be examined
  • Moved NPC out of the way of the lamp so triggering dialogue is easier

-Bittersweet-

Made for A Game By Its Cover 2016 jam.

It ended up being kind of a weird experimental game as I picked the visual style before putting in any of the gameplay mechanics but I think it came out okay. It's kind of hard I am sorry.

Programming, art, and design all by Kez.
